Package it.unipr.barbato.Model.Message

Class ServerOffersHandler

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.barbato.Model.Message.ServerOffersHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler, jakarta.jms.MessageListener
public class ServerOffersHandler extends Object implements Handler, jakarta.jms.MessageListener
The ServerOffersHandler class implements the Handler and MessageListener interfaces to handle server-side offers for products. It keeps track of the number of connected clients and response to client offers.
Author:
Vincenzo Barbato 345728
